main event: Two farmers in Scotia, Nebraska witnessed an object resembling a balloon descending, while experiencing a temporary sensation of paralysis.
interesting points: The sighting was reported on November 5, 1957, around 5:30 PM., The object emitted a noise similar to a helicopter and had an odor resembling burning fuel., The object was described as looking like a balloon., The object did not reach the ground and ascended again before disappearing., Hearsay from a previous conversation suggested that the farmers were paralyzed briefly upon seeing the object.
witness description: two boys who were farmers' sons
